title: Practitioner Capacity-Building Program for Blended Learning Design in Engineering

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Engineering Principles and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: Designed around authentic problem-solving processes that in-service professionals may encounter in real work environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world problem-solving processes in energy auditing to model experts' cognitive and behavioral processes
Learners can utilize digital resources (tools, simulations, case materials) for context-specific problem-solving in an LMS-based blended learning environment
Learners can diagnose problems occurring in real work contexts and propose solutions through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
